      • addRoad

        public void addRoad(City cityA,
                    City cityB,
                    double km)
             throws AlreadyHasAdjacency,
                    InexistentVertexException,
                    LoopIsNotAllowedException,
                    InexistentEntryException,
                    DuplicateEntryException
        Method that Add a Road Between two Cities.
        Parameters:
        cityA - The First City.
        cityB - The Second City.
        km - The length of the Road.
        Throws:
        DuplicateEntryException - If there's already a Road between these Cities.
        AlreadyHasAdjacency - If there's already a Road between these Cities.
        InexistentVertexException - If one of the Cities doesn't exist.
        LoopIsNotAllowedException - If the Codes are headed for the same City.
        InexistentEntryException

      • addRoad

                    double km)
             throws DuplicateEntryException,
                    AlreadyHasAdjacency,
                    InexistentVertexException,
                    LoopIsNotAllowedException
        Method that adds a Road between a City and an Intersection.
        Parameters:
        inter - The Intersection.
        city - The City.
        km - The length of the Road.
        Throws:
        DuplicateEntryException - If there's already a Road between these Points.
        AlreadyHasAdjacency - If there's already a Road between these Points.
        InexistentVertexException - If one of the Points doesn't exist.
        LoopIsNotAllowedException - If the Codes are headed for the same Point.

        InexistentVertexException - If one of the Points doesn't exist.

        out - The departure date.

      • shortestPath

        public java.util.Iterator shortestPath(java.lang.String cpf,
                                       java.lang.String tripName)
                                throws NotFoundException,
                                       InexistentEntryException,
                                       DuplicateEntryException,
                                       InsufficientSpotsException,
                                       TheresNoEntryException,
                                       NoWaysException
        Method that finds the shortest path for the Trip.
        Parameters:
        cpf - The CPF of the user.
        tripName - The name of the Trip registered.
        Returns:
        The Iterator of the ArrayList with the points of the shortest route.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - If there's not a Trip or an User registered in the system with the data informed.
        InexistentEntryException - If there some City in the Trip that doesn't exists in the Graph.
        DuplicateEntryException
        InsufficientSpotsException - If the Trip don't has a least two points.
        TheresNoEntryException
        NoWaysException
